reviewText: I found the dances way too slow for the music. Kids at this age like to move around a lot more than these dances allow. There's only 3 dances and i think this dvd is overpriced for the quality. My 3 year old was bored with this dvd.
Wee ones to older kids will enjoy this DVD. Storytelling and advice to teachers/parents are included. Teaches kids the basics of worshiping the Lord.
